description: Detects powershell scripts that import modules from suspicious directories
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Import PowerShell Modules From Suspicious Directories - ProcCreation
query: process.command_line.text:(*Import\-Module\ \"$Env\:Temp\\* OR *Import\-Module\ '$Env\:Temp\\* OR *Import\-Module\ $Env\:Temp\\* OR *Import\-Module\ \"$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *Import\-Module\ '$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *Import\-Module\ $Env\:Appdata\\* OR *Import\-Module\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *ipmo\ \"$Env\:Temp\\* OR *ipmo\ '$Env\:Temp\\* OR *ipmo\ $Env\:Temp\\* OR *ipmo\ \"$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *ipmo\ '$Env\:Appdata\\* OR *ipmo\ $Env\:Appdata\\* OR *ipmo\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\*)
